sentences.sContent: They can resist appeals to their dearest prejudices and all kinds of cajolery.
sentences.sContent_eng: They can resist appeals to their dearest prejudices and all kinds of cajolery.
sentences.sCn: 他们可以抵抗来自内心最深处的偏见，以及各种各样的甜言蜜语。

sentences.sContent: I have been over the age of intoxication in cajolery.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have been over the age of intoxication in cajolery.
sentences.sCn: 我已经过了喜欢听甜言蜜语的年纪。
